name: gift-registry
description: Gift registry for multiple users across multiple groups to prevent duplicate gifts

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i --production=false
scripts.update-build: npm run set-default && npm run build
scripts.build-open: npm run update-build && npm run start
scripts.init-build: npm install && npm run set-default && npm run build
scripts.build-test: npm run update-build && npm run test

author: jtschams
